alert.note: Alert for Pembina (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 08 at 7:25PM CDT until further notice by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Minnesota...North Dakota... Red River of the North at Drayton affecting Pembina, Walsh, Marshall and Kittson Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota...North Dakota... Red River of the North at Oslo affecting Polk, Walsh, Marshall and Grand Forks Counties. Red River of the North at Fargo affecting Cass and Clay Counties. Red River of the North at Pembina affecting Pembina and Kittson Counties. Red River of the North at East Grand Forks affecting Polk and Grand Forks Counties. .All sites on the Red River have crested. Recessions in river levels are expected over the next seven days. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Red River of the North at Pembina. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 46.0 feet, General rural flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:30 PM CDT Monday the stage was 45.9 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 6:30 PM CDT Monday was 46.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 40.8 feet Monday evening. - Flood stage is 39.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
